languages.text: "Внеси свой вклад в исцеление ран, нанесенных Кьяве Гамма, и ваш род будет прощен".
languages.translation_comment: открывает проект в колонизации "строительство Кьява Гаммы"

traits.locale_text: "Обещаю тебе, что Кьява Гамма будет отстроена во всей славе своей".

languages.text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."
languages.original_text: "Внеси свой вклад в исцеление ран, нанесенных Кьяве Гамма, и ваш род будет прощен".

traits.locale_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."
"I give you my word that Kiava Gamma will be rebuilt in all its splendor."
"Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."
"I give you my word that Kiava Gamma will be rebuilt in all its splendour."
"I give you my word that Kiava Gamma will be rebuilt in all its splendour."
"Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマに与えられた傷を癒やす役目を果たせば、お前の家も許されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマに与えられた傷を癒やす役目を果たせば、お前の家も許されるだろう」

languages.text: “尽你所能平复基亚瓦伽马星受到的创伤，这样一来，你的家族就会得到宽恕。”
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: “我向你保证，基亚瓦伽马星会恢复昔日的辉煌。”

languages.text: «Cumpla su deber para restaurar las heridas sufridas por Kiava Gamma y su casa será perdonada».
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: «Le aseguro que Kiava Gamma resurgirá con todo su esplendor».

languages.text: « Si vous faites le nécessaire pour soigner les blessures infligées à Kiava Gamma, votre maison sera pardonnée. »
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous faites le nécessaire pour soigner les blessures infligées à Kiava Gamma, votre maison sera pardonnée. »

languages.text: "Tragt Euren Teil dazu bei, die auf Kiava Gamma geschlagenen Wunden zu heilen, dann wird Eurem Haus verziehen."
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass Kiava Gamma in seiner ganzen Pracht wiederaufgebaut wird."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'nın yaralarını iyileştirmek için üzerine düşeni yap, hanen affedilsin."
languages.original_text: "Do your part to heal the wounds inflicted on Kiava Gamma and your house will be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'nın yaralarını iyileştirmek için üzerine düşeni yap, hanen affedilsin."

languages.translation_comment: открывает проект в колонизации "строительство Кьява Гаммы"
